title: PM appreciates security forces for repelling attack of Fitna Al-Khawarij
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 13 (APP):Â Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif Thursday appreciated the officers and personnel of security forces for foiling attack of terrorists of Fitna al-Khawarij on their check post in Jandola, Tank.
He lauds the professional capabilities of officers and personnel of security forces for eliminating 10 Khawarij including a suicide bomber who unsuccessfully tried to attack the post.
He said the government would continue to foil designs of the terrorists who were trying to create unrest in the country.
The war against menace of terrorism would continue till its complete elimination from the country, he added.
He said the whole nation stood with the armed forces of Pakistan in their determination to wipe out terrorism from the country.
